parameters.description: The query to perform. Traditional MongoDB queries are supported
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: The max number of results.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The number of records to when returning the results. When paginating results, the page number = ceil(offset/limit)
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: If false, implicit permissions are ignored and only records to which the user has explicit permissions are returned
parameters.name: privileged

responseMessages.message: Raised if a user does not supply a UUID or supplies an invalid JSON query

The service was unable to query the metadata database
